title: Assa (1987) (AC3)
description:
ASSA / ACCA

Please note, this release does not have subtitles, and as far as I know this whole movie is in russian.

ASSA is set in Crimea during the winter in the mid eighties. A young musician (Bananan) falls for mobster's (Krymov) young mistress (Alika). The parallel story line involves an 18th century assassination plot.

This rip was not done by me, I don't know who did it but here's the source: http://www.douban.com/note/16297926/

XVID/6 channel AC3

Soon I'll be able to upload a DVD9 version of this. If you're interested, please comment.

Last.. but not least. AssA!,, Hello to you to Russia.. This upload is dedicated to You.
